parameters.description: comment can contain any portion of the comment entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

parameters.description: name can contain any portion of the rulename entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

parameters.description: siProfile can contain any portion of the ServiceProfile name associated with L3redirectrule. Search is case insensitive.

parameters.description: edgeId is the EdgeID, that displays rules applicable to the specified Edge

get.description: Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

parameters.name: contextId
parameters.description: vc-moref-id of the datacenter, portgroup, vm, or UUID of the vNIC for which traffic flow is to be retrieved

parameters.name: flowType
parameters.description: Type of flow to be retrieved (TCP_UDP|LAYER2|LAYER3)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Flows with start time greater than specified time are retrieved

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Flows with start time lower than specified time are retrieved

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: (optional) Specifies starting point for retrieval. If not specified, start from the beginning by default

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: (optional) Limit the max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched
